selected_quotes: Pleased to see Gillian Beer's *Alice in Space* is to be published in November (in USA)
And a new book from Gillian Beer, on Alice in Wonderland!
Gillian Beer's new book, *Alice in Space* is out very soon.
... and see Gillian Beer's wonderful new book on the rich intellectual world of Lewis Carroll. Alice in Space.

author.name: Dr Michael Whitworth
author.description: Tutor, Lecturer, Researcher. Literature & Science, Modernism, History of the Book, Virginia Woolf, 1920s & 1930s poetry. All tweets in a personal capacity.

author.name: Peter Adkins
author.description: Writing PhD on modernism in the anthropocene at @UniKent. Joyce, Woolf & Barnes. Interested in the aesthetics of ecology. Lives on North Downs, Kent.

author.name: Will Tattersdill
author.description: Lecturer in Victorian Literature at the University of Birmingham. Literature and science, dinosaurs, popular fiction, magazine history, imperialism, etc.

facebook.title: History: Untangling Alice : Nature : Nature Research
facebook.summary:
Gillian Beer has published an essay entitled 'Untangling Alice' in *Nature*, 17 November 2016. Available online: http://www.nature.com/nature/journal/v539/n7629/full/539356a.html

Gillian will talk about her new book, Alice in Space, at our Study Day, Stap

blogs.title: Alice in Space (in Nature)
blogs.summary: Gillian Beer wrote “History: Untangling Alice” for Nature, synthesizing some of the research from her book Alice In Space, which examines the Alice books by Lewis Carroll via the immediate context in which they la

author.name: The Chicago Blog
author.description: Intelligent commentary, curated content, news, reviews, and all things digital, published by the University of Chicago Press

news.title: Book of the Week: Gillian Beer's Alice in Space: The Sideways Victorian World of Lewis Carroll
news.summary: “There is always something else, something other, to say about Alice.” (Alice in Space) For generations of readers and critics, Lewis Carroll’s Alice books have proven irresistible – literary historians, theorists, linguists, mathematicians and…
